text: I spent over $10,000 with freelance prompt writers already. They write meta prompts three, five, 10 page long. I went to someone who was working at Microsoft Copilot team. He was the guy who was writing prompts from Microsoft Copilot. He charged $1,000 per prompt. Bro, that's $10,000 for 10 prompts. But with those 10 prompts, I can build a $10 million business. Can help your team to do attribution of your data, which used to take them 10 hours in a minute. And you don't need 10 people. You need one person to run that. Isn't that worth $10,000 for
